extensionDescription.message: Move your tabs to the side of your browser window.
extensionDescription.description: Extension description shown in the options page and as short description on addons.mozilla.org.

extensionsLongDescription.message:
Tab Center Reborn is the continuation of Tab Center Redux to provide a simple, powerful and well-integrated extension to manage tabs vertically. The extension provides a handful of settings and allows power-users to customize its appearance completely with CSS code.
  • Use Shift+F1 to open or close the extension
  • How to hide the top tab bar
You can contribute with translation, documentation, issue report or code!

browserActionTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering the toolbar button.

browserActionOn.description: Badge text shown when sidebar is open.

browserActionOff.description: Badge text shown when sidebar is closed.

sidebarTitle.description: Label shown in the sidebar selector.

newTabBtnTooltip.description: Tooltip of the New Tab button in the top menu.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placehorder of the Search bar in the top menu.

settingsBtnTooltip.description: Tooltip of the settings button in the top menu.

closeTabButtonTooltip.description: Tooltip of the close button on tabs.

allTabsLabel.description: Label shown at the bottom of the list of tabs if some tabs are filtered by the current search query.

closeTabsAfterWarning.message: Do you really want to close the $COUNT$ tabs underneath?
closeTabsAfterWarning.description: Warning shown when trying to close more than 4 tabs when closing tabs underneath another.

closeAllTabsExceptWarning.message: Do you really want to close the $COUNT$ other tabs?
closeAllTabsExceptWarning.description: Warning shown when trying to close more than 4 tabs when closing all tabs except one.

optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.message: Clicking active tab switch to the last active one.
optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.description: Explanation for the Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeExplanation.message: The Compact Mode reduces the height of tabs to show more of them. In the Dynamic setting, it will engage once we have no space left.
optionsCompactModeExplanation.description: Explanation for the Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeOff.description: Possible value for Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeDynamic.description: Possible value for Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeStrict.description: Possible value for Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsThemeIntegrationExplanation.message: Integrate with custom theme instead of using the above theme. Close and reopen the sidebar after switching back to one of Firefox’s default theme.
optionsThemeIntegrationExplanation.description: Explanation for the Theme Integration option in the options page.

optionsWarnBeforeClosing.message: Warn before closing more than $COUNT$ tabs
